name: The Noodle
description:
Let's get the noodles into these bamboo tubes!

Move the tube to the left or right to catch the falling noodles skillfully.
The slithering noodles will make the game becomes more challenging to play.

One of the trick to handle this game is that you need to control the tube by looking at the movements of the noodles without being distracted.

Okay, it's time for you to start this challenge!
